Class Spell

  • java.lang.Object
    • warlock.spell.Spell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updateable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Explosion, Fireball, Lightning, Seekerorb, Shield, Teleport

    public abstract class Spell
extends java.lang.Object
implements Updateable

      • setLevelData

        public void setLevelData(double[][] levelData)
        Register the level data. The 2d array is in form [data type][level]. Data type corresponds to the "level data names" and the "level" reflects what the data is each level.
        Parameters:
        levelData -

      • setLevelDataNames

        public void setLevelDataNames(java.lang.String[] levelDataNames)
        The names of the datas registered with setLevelData. Should equal length as levelData[], ie excluding the level part of the 2d array.
        Parameters:
        levelDataNames -
